unnormalised: Someone asked me for tips on finding a PG in Koramangala, Bangalore. Finding a decent place was quite the adventure!
normalised: Someone asked me for tips on finding a P-G in Koramangala, Bangalore. Finding a decent place was quite the adventure!

unnormalised: First thing I did was scout around near Christ College, since that's where my friend studies. I noted down a few addresses like #45, 8th Main, 3rd Block, Koramangala 560034. Turns out many PGs don’t really put up proper signboards. Also, websites often have outdated info, like showing 'Available' at 12, JNC Road, Koramangala, but when I went there, it was a completely different business! So, physically checking is a must.

unnormalised: Another trick I learned was asking local chai wallahs. They know EVERYTHING! One guy gave me a tip about a newly opened PG near the BDA Complex – apparently it's at 10/A, 1st Cross, 7th Main, Sector 6, HSR Layout, Bangalore, 560102, but he warned me it's a bit pricey. Don't rely solely on online listings; the best spots are often found through word-of-mouth. Good luck with your search!
